sql.query:
SELECT a.TRD_DD, b.CLSPRC, a.OPNPRC, c.HGPRC, c.LWPRC, c.TRDVOL, a.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM
(SELECT TRD_DD, OPNPRC, FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY TRUNC(TO_DATE(TRD_DD,'yyyymmdd'),'d')) as WEEK FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? AND TRD_DD IN ( SELECT MIN(s.TRD_DD) TRD_DD FROM (SELECT TRD_DD, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY TRUNC(TO_DATE(TRD_DD,'yyyymmdd'),'d')) as WEEK FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? ) s GROUP BY s.WEEK )) a,
(SELECT TRD_DD, CLSPRC, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY TRUNC(TO_DATE(TRD_DD,'yyyymmdd'),'d')) as WEEK FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? AND TRD_DD IN ( SELECT MAX(s.TRD_DD) TRD_DD FROM (SELECT TRD_DD, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY TRUNC(TO_DATE(TRD_DD,'yyyymmdd'),'d')) as WEEK FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? ) s GROUP BY s.WEEK )) b,
(SELECT MAX(s.HGPRC) HGPRC, MIN(s.LWPRC) LWPRC, SUM(s.TRDVOL) TRDVOL, s.WEEK FROM (SELECT TRD_DD, HGPRC, LWPRC,TRDVOL, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY TRUNC(TO_DATE(TRD_DD,'yyyymmdd'),'d')) as WEEK FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? ) s GROUP BY s.WEEK ) c
WHERE a.WEEK = b.WEEK AND a.WEEK = c.WEEK ORDER BY a.TRD_DD

sql.query:
SELECT a.TRD_DD, b.CLSPRC, a.OPNPRC, c.HGPRC, c.LWPRC, c.TRDVOL, a.FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY FROM
(SELECT TRD_DD, OPNPRC, FORN_ORD_LMT_QTY, SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6) YM FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? AND TRD_DD IN ( SELECT MIN(TRD_DD) TRD_DD FROM CHART_TEST_DATA GROUP BY SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6) )) a,
(SELECT CLSPRC, SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6) YM FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? AND TRD_DD IN ( SELECT MAX(TRD_DD) TRD_DD FROM CHART_TEST_DATA GROUP BY SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6) )) b,
(SELECT MAX(HGPRC) HGPRC, MIN(LWPRC) LWPRC, SUM(TRDVOL) TRDVOL, SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6) YM FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE = ? GROUP BY SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6)) c WHERE a.YM = b.YM AND a.YM = c.YM ORDER BY a.TRD_DD
